p: Despite this interest, no study has been done so far to investigate the WHE as a natural antioxidant for the stabilization of traditional butter. For the reason, this research aimed to examine the effect of treating WHE compared with other antioxidants, namely Butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT), tocopherol on oxidation, chemical, microbial against ( S. aureus, coliforms, psychrotrophic bacteria and yeast/mold) and sensory properties of TB during refrigerated storage.
